Entries.NPC.cs.4275: For my birthday? You shouldn't have!#$b#Okay you totally should have, and I'm glad you did haha.
Entries.NPC.cs.4277: You got this for my birthday?#$b#Heh. You're amazing, @.
Entries.NPC.cs.4281: You remembered my birthday? Thanks, this is awesome!

Entries.Riley0: I can't believe I'm really getting married... Wow...$l
Entries.Riley1: Everything feels so surreal, doesn't it?$l

Entries.fall_Wed4: $q 565639/565640 fall_Wed4_old#Hey uh... This might be an odd question, but I can't find my underwear? You didn't take it by any chance, did you?#$r 565639 0 undies_no#No?? But I hope you find them.#$r 565640 0 undies_maybe#Maybe... Why do you ask?#$r 565640 20 undies_yes#Sorry, they just looked better on me.
Entries.undies_no: Oh, dang.$s#$b#Oh well. I'm sure they're around my house somewhere, heh.
Entries.undies_maybe: Pfff. Well if you did, it's fine, but I'd like them back eventually, okay?
Entries.undies_yes: Wh- PFFFF. You can't tell me that and not show off the goods! How unfair!$10#$b#You'll have to wear them over next time you spend the night, okay?$16
Entries.fall_Wed4_old: Oh hey, it's pomegranate season, isn't it? I don't like them as much as cherries, but they're pretty tasty.#$e#Mostly I guess pomegranates are cool because of some old myths that involve them. Just that association with fun stories, ya know?

Entries.fall_Sat10: I love this time of year... almost as much as I...$l#$b#I um... I...$11#$q 565615 fall_Sat10_old#What I'm trying to say is...#$r 565615 50 fall_Sat10_love#I love you, too, Riley.#$r 565615 25 fall_Sat10_ok#It's okay, you don't have to say it. I know.
Entries.fall_Sat10_love: I-...$l#$b#I mean, of course you do! I'm awesome, right? Haha.$10#$b#...But I love you too, @.$l
Entries.fall_Sat10_ok: Wh- No I can do it!$11#$b#Iloveyou!$11#$b#I'll um... I'll get better at it. Haha.$12
Entries.fall_Sat10_old: I love you, babe. ...Hey, I said it!$l

Entries.dumped_Guys: Huh, are your other partners giving you the cold shoulder? What big babies. I'm sure they'll get over it.$7#$b#For the record, I'm fine with you dating everyone, heh.
Entries.dumped_Girls: Oh Yoba, are your other partners giving you the cold shoulder? How dramatic. I'm sure they'll get over it.$7#$b#For the record, I'm fine with you dating everyone, heh.

Entries.Riley: It's such a bummer day. No one's out doing anything...$s#$e#But hey! At least you came to see me. Thanks!
It's surprising to have a day like this in the middle of summer, but I guess it's better than a drought, huh?#$e#Your crops must be happy, and I guess it means less work for you for today!$10
Mmmm... Rain during the cold season makes me wanna get all cozy and sleep.$8#$b#Maybe reread one of my favorite graphic novels or play some games, after a nap.$10
Mmmm... Rain during the cold season makes me wanna get all cozy and sleep.$8#$b#Maybe you should come snuggle up with me for a while, huh?$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Morning, love. Did you sleep well?#$b#Just so you know later I'm headed into town for a bit, then hanging out with Abigail for a while. I'll be home later!
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Hey babe, you have a good day?#$b#It's nice to get out of the house from time to time.$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Hey gorgeous. What's on the agenda for today?$h#$b#I'm headed into town later. Gotta hang out with everyone at the Saloon tonight, ya know!$10
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Mmmmm, I drank too much... Come lay in bed and cuddle with me.$8

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Heya! I'm headed to Sam's this morning to watch band practice for a bit. I'll be home later, okay?$h
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Sam and Sebastian were sounding awesome today. It's a shame Abigail doesn't make practice more though. But ah well.

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Morning, love. Did you sleep well?#$b#Just so you know later I'm headed into town for a bit, then hanging out with Sebastian for a while. I'll be home later!
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Hey babe, you have a good day?#$b#It's nice to get out of the house from time to time.$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Morning, babe! I made you some nice breakfast! [200 201 211 234 610 651]$10#$e#So you know, I'm thinking of heading to the beach for a while today, then hanging out with Abigail up on the mountain.#$b#I'll see you when I get home.
Entries.funReturn_Riley: How was your day, gorgeous? I had fun with mine!$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: The weather is gorgeous today isn't it? I think I'll hit the beach again before heading to the Saloon for Friday hang-out.$10
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Awww, I think I got a tad sunburned.$s#$e#It's not too bad, but you'll have to be gentle with me, hehe.$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Morning! I was thinking of heading up to the mountain to hang out with Sebastian today. After that I might hit the Saloon.#$e#I hope you have a wonderful day, my love.$h
Entries.funReturn_Riley: So how was your day? Why don't we go snuggle in bed while you tell me all about it?$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Heya. I'm headed into work for a bit this morning, then hanging out some with Abigail. I'll see you when I get home, okay?
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Evening, love. Did you have a good day? Mine was long, but nice.

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Morning! It's Saturday, which means I'll be heading to watch Sam and Sebastian practice their latest song.$h#$e#After that I'll be heading out shopping. Is there anything I should pick up for us?
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Evening, babe. Did you see the groceries I put in the fridge? I got a few of your favorites.$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: *sigh* It's that time of year again. Time for my doctor's appointment...$s#$b#But it's okay. I can manage if it means staying healthy for you.$10
Entries.funReturn_Riley: My appointment went well! You'll be happy to know I'm healthy as ever.$h

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Good morning, my love. I've got work this morning, so I'll be headed out soon. After that I might go socialize a while, but I'll be home later.
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Evening! I picked up some dinner on my way home. [197 208 224 231 236 237 727]$10

Entries.funLeave_Riley: Hey babe. I'm thinking of heading into Night Market tonight.$h#$e#Also, I made you breakfast! Enjoy! [200 201 211 234 610 651]$10
Entries.funReturn_Riley: Night Market is always pretty fun, don't you think?

Entries.rainygame1: Hey @, do you like MMOs? I like healing roles myself, but damage can be fun, too.#$b#As much as I usually like being the center of attention, I'll pass on tanking though.$u
Rainy days like this are perfect for some relaxing gaming...#$b#...when the hunter doesn't pull before the tank oh sweet Yoba why.$a

Entries.shop4: I can't believe Pierre is out of cocoa again! Who keeps buying it all?$a#$b#At this rate I almost wanna shop at JojaMart, but I don't wanna go all the way to the city to find one now... Oh well.$s

Entries.abigail_videogames: I'm glad Riley's here! Together we're good enough to actually make some progress in this stupid game!$h
Thanks for letting me borrow your hubby, @! I really need his help to get past these awful levels!
Hang on, we've never gotten this far before! I just-#$b#Oh no!! They're everywhere! Aaaaah!$7
Riley, watch out!$7#$b#Phew, that was too close! But we made it out alive!$h

Entries.RileyHouse.1: Riley seems to be drawing uh... a study of human anatomy.
Entries.RileyHouse.2: Various pieces and cards for Solarion Chronicles are strewn across the table.
Entries.RileyHouse.3: There's a wide array of different makeup here.
Entries.RileyHouse.4: The large bed looks warm and inviting.
Entries.RileyHouse.5: The computer has an MMORPG pulled up in windowed mode. Behind it, there are about thirty browser tabs open, but it's hard to tell what they are.
Entries.RileyHouse.6: There's a wide variety of content, from fantasy novels to fashion magazines to old textbooks.
Entries.RileyHouse.7: This shelf is filled with graphic novels. There's a complete set of a popular harem romance series.
Entries.RileySpouse.1: There are little hearts drawn in the margins of the page.
Entries.RileySpouse.2: The old text books were left behind in the move, but Riley's harem romance manga collection has grown.
Entries.RileySpouse.3: It's the latest edition of Solarion Chronicles, along with several custom painted figures.
Entries.RileySpouse.4: The rulebook is open to a page about lycanthropy.
Entries.RileySpouse.5: The MMO login screen is pulled up. Riley mostly plays after I go to bed these days.

Entries.RileyHouse.1: The page is filled with sketches of werewolves. Maybe Riley was trying to decide on a pose.

Entries.Riley4: Hey @!^It's been a real blast getting to know you. Pelican Town is finally starting to feel like home, isn't it? Anyway I was just writing because I saw some cool seeds and thought of you. I don't know when you're supposed to plant them but I figured you would. ^ Best Wishes, Riley %item object 486 5 %%

Entries.Riley: I hear Abigail always wins this thing. You think she'd let the kids have a turn...$s#$e#N-not that I wanted to win or anything.$12
I love dancing, but this one seems kind of stuffy and old-fashioned. Guess that's what you can expect in this sort of town.
Hey @. I hope you brought something good for the soup!#$b#Because if it sucks, we're all blaming specifically you.$u#$e#I'm just teasing... but seriously, don't screw up.$10
Oh man... I'm not sure if I would've loved to live in Pelican Town that year or if I'm glad I didn't. Good job, Sam.
I need Leah to teach me some painting techniques. I'd love to capture the gorgeous lighting of the jelly dance.
I'm so excited. I've never seen the jellies dance before, but it sounds beautiful.
Pssst! Hey! Between you and me, I think the spinny wheel is weighted. It's split half and half, but it totally lands on green more than orange.#$b#Go try it and see!$h
This setup is cool and all, but back in the city we used to dress up for Spirit's Eve. Where's the costume party here?$s#$e#Ah well... Good luck if you try the maze, @!
Isn't Leah's sculpture amazing? I can draw, but I can't sculpt like that. I'm almost jealous!$10
Merry Feast of Winter Star, @! I hope you get something good!$h#$e#Even without the presents, I love the aesthetic this time of year!
